titlestmt.titleproper: Near East Foundation records, Accession 2010:020, RG 3
A Guide to the Near East Foundation records, Accession 2010:020, RG 3 FA1306

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-09-12 00:13:26 -0400.

did.unittitle: Near East Foundation records, Accession 2010:020, RG 3

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged item may be restricted at the discretion of RAC.

When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

All inquiries to view films require advanced notice of at least 2 business days, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those that are not available in modern formats, may be restricted from access at the discretion of RAC.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Special format items (audio, film, video, library materials, memorabilia, oversize, and photographic material) have been separated from the body of the collection and assigned a unique separation number, as noted. Requests to access open special formats should reference the unique separation number.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Level 2 Minimal Processing has been conducted to establish basic intellectual and physical control of the material and assess immediate preservation and conservation needs. Material remains as received, in original folders and storage boxes.

did.unittitle: Near East Foundation records, Accession 2010:020, RG 3

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Near East Foundation collection donated to Rockefeller Archive Center by Charles Benjamin, NEF President, June 2011.
